detail_desc: Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.
Soft slippers in imitation suede with elastication around the opening and a loop at the back. Faux fur linings and insoles,and soft soles in imitation leather with anti-slip protectors.

Dress in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with embroidery and a seam with gathers front and back at the top. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.

Long dress in glittery patterned mesh with a V-neck at the front, deep V-neck at the back and concealed zip in one side. Adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps that cross, lace and fasten at the back, seam at the waist and a flare to the hem. Satin lining.
Calf-length dress in a linen weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a double-layered bodice. Ties at the waist, buttons off-centre down the front and a slit at the hem.
Calf-length dress in a linen weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a double-layered bodice. Ties at the waist, buttons off-centre down the front and a slit at the hem.
Cropped top in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, deep opening at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Long sleeves and plastic studs at the hem.
Long skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, sewn-in wrapover at the front and a concealed zip in one side. Plastic studs and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs. Size from approx. 1-4 cm.
Short, fitted dress in soft, stretch jersey with a pattern made from studs on both the front and back. Round neckline at the front, a V-neck at the back, padded shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in soft, stretch jersey with a pattern made from studs on both the front and back. Round neckline at the front, a V-neck at the back, padded shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle and round metal studs. Width 2.5 cm.
Short, fitted dress in sequined, glittery jersey with a gently draped neckline at the front, narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a short slit at one side of the hem. Lined.

Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in stretch, glossy jersey with pleated straps that go over the arms. Discreet V-neck, a silicone trim around the inside of the top, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined at the top.

Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in stretch, glossy jersey with pleated straps that go over the arms. Discreet V-neck, a silicone trim around the inside of the top, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined at the top.

Long, fitted dress in stretch jersey with a sheen. Deep V-neck, spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back, a seam at the waist and a close-fitting skirt that flares at the hem and is longer at the back. Lined bodice.

Fitted, longer-style jacket in woven fabric with a shawl collar and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Welt front pockets, long sleeves with short slits at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Long, fitted dress in crinkled jersey with glittery threads. Narrow cut at the top, a halter neck with concealed press-studs at the back, and a concealed zip at the back. Close-fitting skirt that flares at the hem and has a high slit at the front. Jersey lining.
Cropped top in sequined, glittery jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a small stand-up collar, wrapover front and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
High-waisted trousers in sequined, glittery jersey with concealed elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.

Dress shirt in a premium cotton weave with a full spread collar, bib front with pin-tucks and a concealed button band. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Treggings in patterned stretch cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long, fitted dress in stretch velour with a concealed zip at the back and open sections at the sides and back. Long sleeves and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Long, fitted dress in stretch velour with a concealed zip at the back and open sections at the sides and back. Long sleeves and a high slit at the front. Unlined.
Short, gently fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with short sleeves.
Short, gently fitted dress in ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with short sleeves.
Leggings in jersey with a slight sheen. High waist with wide elastication.

Lightly padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hems. Foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining.

Lightly padded all-in-one suit in woven fabric. Pile-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hems. Foldover mitts and feet to keep the hands and feet warm. Soft pile lining.
Jacket in a patterned weave with a detachable, lined hood, high collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Lightly padded sleeves and covered elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, yoke at the back and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with a detachable, lined hood, yoke at the back and long raglan sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Lined.

Jacket in a patterned rustle weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with an elasticated front edge. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Jacket in a patterned rustle weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood with an elasticated front edge. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims around the opening and pockets. Stand up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims around the opening and pockets. Stand up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Large earrings in metal and patterned plastic. Length 5.5 cm.

Set with a cardigan and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton jersey. Cardigan with small frills on the shoulders, press-studs down the front and short slits in the sides. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist.

Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave. Ballerina neckline with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the front, and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Dress in a soft, patterned viscose weave. Ballerina neckline with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the front, and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication and detachable tie belt at the waist. Skirt with a wrapover, asymmetric, flounced hem. Jersey lining.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a seam with concealed elastication and detachable tie belt at the waist. Skirt with a wrapover, asymmetric, flounced hem. Jersey lining.

Dress in woven fabric with a collar, button placket, gathered yoke at the back, and a detachable belt in braided imitation suede. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a chest pocket with a button, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, a chest pocket with a button, concealed pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

High-waisted briefs in sturdy microfibre with comfortable support for the tummy and back. The briefs are made with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and a soft feel against the skin. Lined gusset.
